Articles.Content:
I made this account back when the forum was first made. I was never really active though, and after hearing about all these great forum massacres I figured my account was probably gone anyway but sure enough, I tried it today and it worked! So here I am. I've been lurking for a long time, but as far as actual activity you could say I'm new. Not sure which version of KSP I started with, but it was quite a while ago. Back when all we had were one command pod, one fuel tank, one liquid engine, and the SRB. I don't think there were even winglets or other things like that but I could be wrong. Didn't have struts either

Anyhoo, how can I change my avatar? I tried clicking all over the place on my profile and I'm not getting any prompts to do so. Is a certain number of posts required?
Hi I think to change avatar is in upper right under "Settings", then "Change Avatar" (or something like that) on the bottom left.
